com.unboundid.ldap.matchingrules

Enum TelephoneNumberComparisonPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<TelephoneNumberComparisonPolicy>
      • com.unboundid.ldap.matchingrules.TelephoneNumberComparisonPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TelephoneNumberComparisonPolicy>

    @ThreadSafety(level=COMPLETELY_THREADSAFE)
public enum TelephoneNumberComparisonPolicy
extends java.lang.Enum<TelephoneNumberComparisonPolicy>
    This enum defines the policy that the TelephoneNumberMatchingRule should use when comparing two values in accordance with this syntax.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      IGNORE_ALL_NON_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS
      A policy that indicates that all non-numeric characters should be ignored when comparing values.
      IGNORE_ONLY_SPACES_AND_DASHES
      A policy that indicates that only spaces and hyphens should be ignored when comparing values.

      Normalizes the provided value in accordance with this policy.

      • normalizeValue

        @NotNull
public ASN1OctetString normalizeValue(@NotNull
                                     ASN1OctetString value)
        Normalizes the provided value in accordance with this policy. This method does not perform any validation on the provided value.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to be normalized. It must not be null.
        Returns:
        The normalized representation of the provided value.
